sentences.english: The courtyard of the National 228 Memorial Museum.
sentences.chinese: 二二八國家紀念館庭院廣場。

sentences.english: All the hangings enclosing the court were of fine twined linen.
sentences.chinese: 庭院四周所有的帷幔，都是用捻的細麻編成的。

sentences.english: Fruit trees, large patio area, Walnut school dist.
sentences.chinese: 果樹，庭院面積大，是屬於核桃學區。

sentences.english: According to Thoman, food waste and yard waste are currently all dumped in a pile together.
sentences.chinese: 託曼說，此刻食物垃圾和庭院銷燬物都堆放在一路。

sentences.english: Used in garden landscape stone add vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在園林庭院內使用景觀石可增添生機活力。

sentences.english: The 2 - storey home is characterised by white, clean-cut volumes arranged around an internal courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 在2層家庭的特點是白色，乾淨切卷安排在內部庭院。

sentences.english: The courtyard was filled with his disciples as well as many Brijbasis.
sentences.chinese: 庭院裏坐滿了他的門徒還有許多布如阿佳居民。

sentences.english: How can I get to the courtyard?
sentences.chinese: 去廣場大酒店庭院怎麼走？

sentences.english: A courtyard in front of a building.
sentences.chinese: 有一道強光照進了庭院。

sentences.english: The main entrance to the building includes an exhibition gallery facing the central garden courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 建築的主要入口包含一個展覽廳，朝向中央花園庭院。

sentences.english: Maple leaves turn black in the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 楓葉在庭院裏變得黑悽悽。

sentences.english: He saw a big bell in the courtyard .
sentences.chinese: 他看見了大響鈴在庭院裏。

sentences.english: The extension has ample glazing, and overlooks a verdant courtyard at the property's centre.
sentences.chinese: 擴展部分有足夠的玻璃窗，俯瞰物業中心青翠的庭院。

sentences.english: In contrast the first floor accomodates the management space, with a small internal patio and terrace in-between them.
sentences.chinese: 地面層有管理用房，其中有小型內部庭院和陽臺。

sentences.english: The women in red shirts are with necked-back and dotting in the classical garden.
sentences.chinese: 紅裙女子，赤裸背影，散落在古典的庭院裏。

definition: courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
